properties.Name: Earthquake Park
properties.Comments: Learn about previous earthquakes affecting Alaska, some great views of the city, and some shorter leisurely hikes.

properties.Name: Bear Tooth Grill
properties.Comments: There is a grill (Mexican cuisine) and Theatrepub (pizza). They are seperate resteraunts, but equally as good in taste. The beer is delicious. Highly recommended.

properties.Name: Far North Bicentennial Park
properties.Comments: Excelent hiking trails from beginners to advanced. Do be wary as there are many areas where bears feed on salmon while in season.
